description: Desert Pucker performance, incredibly soft comfort, a super-clean look – the Sonoran is a shirt for wide-open days. The button front’s hidden placket gives it a modern look that moves easily from workplace to long weekend, and the ultra-soft, eco-conscious textured fabric is cool and breathable. This is a go-to shirt that looks great and feels amazing.
name: Royal Robbins Sonoran Desert SS - Mens
